痵字的基本解释

痵
jì
心跳太快、太强或不规则的病：“使我至今病痵。”
古同“悸”。

痵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jì］
［《廣韻》其季切，去至，羣。］
同“悸1”。
怔忡，心疾跳。

痵字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　痵； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页775第01
【唐韻】【集韻】?其季切，音悸。【說文】气不定也。【玉篇】心動也。亦作悸。【廣韻】病中恐也。

痵字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
痵字的起名意思

暂无。

痵
Basic explanation of words
痵
jì
Diseases with too fast, too strong or irregular heartbeats: "I am sick to this day."
Gu Tong "palpitations."
痵
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jì］
["Guangyun" its season cut, go to, group. ]
Same as "palpitations 1".
Shocked, heart beating.
痵
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [The Department of Sui Characters] 　痵; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 775 No. 01
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Its season cut, sound palpitations. [Said the text] Is also uncertain. [Jade articles] Heartbeat too. Also for palpitations. [Guang Yun] I am afraid of illness.
